segments.cn: 然后我会告诉你我婚礼的所有事情。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: Okay, so this is a very common way of talking to someone or getting some more information from a person.
segments.cn: 好的，所以这是一种与某人交谈或从某人那里获取更多信息的非常常见的方式。

segments.en: So let's listen to some more examples of, by the way.
segments.cn: 让我们再听一些关于“顺便说一下”的例子。

segments.en: Example one.
segments.cn: 例子一。

segments.en: By the way, I heard you've recently been promoted.
segments.cn: 顺便说一下，我听说你最近升职了。

segments.en: Example two.
segments.cn: 例子二。

segments.en: I heard your daughter just had a baby.
segments.cn: 我听说你女儿刚生了个宝宝。

segments.en: Congratulations!
segments.cn: 恭喜！

segments.en: Example three.
segments.cn: 例子三。

segments.en: Oh, I heard you just got back from holiday in France.
segments.cn: 哦，我听说你刚从法国度假回来。

segments.en: Alright, now, since these two ladies don't like each other very much, they want to end the conversation, right?
segments.cn: 好的，现在，由于这两个女士不太喜欢彼此，她们想结束对话，对吧？

segments.en: Right, they want to end the conversation and, well, you want to end it in a polite way, right?
segments.cn: 对，她们想结束对话，而且，你想以礼貌的方式结束，对吧？

segments.en: So they use a really great phrase here.
segments.cn: 所以她们在这里使用了一个很好的短语。

segments.en: They said, it's been great talking to you, but I have to get going.
segments.cn: 她们说，和你聊天真好，但我得走了。

segments.en: Right, so it's like, well, it's been great talking to you, but I have to get going.
segments.cn: 对，所以就像，嗯，和你聊天真好，但我得走了。

segments.en: So, it's been great talking to you.
segments.cn: 所以，和你聊天真好。

segments.en: Uh-huh.
segments.cn: 嗯。

segments.en: I've enjoyed talking to you.
segments.cn: 我很享受和你聊天。

segments.en: Right, so this is a very polite, very subtle way of saying, hey, I have to go, or bye, I can't talk anymore.
segments.cn: 对，所以这是一种非常礼貌、非常微妙的方式在说，嘿，我得走了，或者再见，我不能再聊了。

segments.en: Yeah, when you say that, you know that the conversation is ending.
segments.cn: 是的，当你这么说时，你知道谈话要结束了。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: Now, she says, I have to get going.
segments.cn: 现在，她说，我得走了。

segments.en: What does it mean, get going?
segments.cn: “走了”是什么意思？

segments.en: That doesn't make much sense.
segments.cn: 这没什么意义。

segments.en: Basically, it just means leave.
segments.cn: 基本上，它只是意味着离开。

segments.en: Okay, I have to leave, I have to get going.
segments.cn: 好吧，我得走了，我得走了。

segments.en: You should get going, you're going to be late.
segments.cn: 你应该走了，你会迟到的。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: Some really good small talk phrases that are useful in any situation.
segments.cn: 一些在任何情况下都很有用的闲聊短语。

segments.en: So, why don't we hear them again one more time by listening to the dialogue.
segments.cn: 所以，为什么我们不再听一遍对话呢。

segments.en: Valerie, hi.
segments.cn: 瓦莱丽，嗨。

segments.en: Wow, how have you been?
segments.cn: 哇，你最近怎么样？

segments.en: It's been such a long time.
segments.cn: 好久不见。

segments.en: Darlene, indeed, it's been a while.
segments.cn: 达琳，确实，好久了。

segments.en: How have you been?
segments.cn: 你最近怎么样？

segments.en: Wow, you look amazing.
segments.cn: 哇，你看起来真棒。

segments.en: I love what you've done with your hair.
segments.cn: 我喜欢你做的发型。

segments.en: Really?
segments.cn: 真的？

segments.en: Thanks.
segments.cn: 谢谢。

segments.en: I went to that hair salon you told me about, but enough about me.
segments.cn: 我去了你告诉我的那家发廊，但够了，谈谈我吧。

segments.en: Look at you.
segments.cn: 看看你。

segments.en: God, you haven't aged a day.
segments.cn: 天啊，你一点都没老。

segments.en: What is your secret?
segments.cn: 你的秘密是什么？

segments.en: Come on.
segments.cn: 来吧。

segments.en: Well, I've been watching what I eat and I work out three times a week.
segments.cn: 嗯，我一直在注意饮食，每周锻炼三次。

segments.en: By the way, I heard your son recently graduated.
segments.cn: 顺便说一下，我听说你儿子最近毕业了。

segments.en: Yes, my little Paul is finally a doctor.
segments.cn: 是的，我的小保罗终于成为医生了。

segments.en: They grow up so fast, you know.
segments.cn: 他们长得真快，你知道的。

segments.en: He is such a handsome guy.
segments.cn: 他真是个帅哥。

segments.en: He gets his looks from his mother, of course.
segments.cn: 他当然是遗传了他母亲的外貌。

segments.en: Thank you.
segments.cn: 谢谢。

segments.en: What about your daughter, Pamela?
segments.cn: 你的女儿帕梅拉怎么样？

segments.en: I heard she passed the bar exam and married recently.
segments.cn: 我听说她最近通过了律师考试并结婚了。

segments.en: Oh yes, she had a beautiful wedding in Cozumel, Mexico, and we all attended.
segments.cn: 哦，是的，她在墨西哥的科苏梅尔举行了美丽的婚礼，我们都参加了。

segments.en: Such a lovely girl.
segments.cn: 真是个可爱的女孩。

segments.en: I hope my Paul is lucky enough to find a girl like that someday.
segments.cn: 我希望我的保罗有幸能找到这样的女孩。

segments.en: But of course.
segments.cn: 当然。

segments.en: Well, it's been great talking to you, but I have to get going.
segments.cn: 嗯，和你聊天很愉快，但我得走了。

segments.en: Same here.
segments.cn: 我也是。

segments.en: We'll catch up soon, maybe over coffee.
segments.cn: 我们很快再聊，也许喝杯咖啡。

segments.en: That would be great.
segments.cn: 那太好了。

segments.en: Give me a call.
segments.cn: 给我打个电话。

segments.en: See you soon.
segments.cn: 很快见。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。

segments.en: I cannot stand that woman or her obnoxious daughter.
segments.cn: 我无法忍受那个女人和她那令人讨厌的女儿。

segments.en: Alright, very good.
segments.cn: 好吧，非常好。
